quote: I went to the woods because I wished to live deliberately, to front only the essential facts of life, and see if I could not learn what it had to teach, and not, when I came to die, discover that I had not lived.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
author: Buddha

quote: Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood. Now is the time to understand more, so that we may fear less.
author: Marie Curie

quote: We must be willing to let go of the life we have planned, so as to have the life that is waiting for us.
author: E. M. Forster

quote: Life is a series of natural and spontaneous changes. Don't resist them - that only creates sorrow. Let reality be reality. Let things flow naturally forward in whatever way they like.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Life's most persistent and urgent question is, 'What are you doing for others?'
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: You have enemies? Good. That means you've stood up for something, sometime in your life.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: The quality, not the longevity, of one's life is what is important.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: You will never be happy if you continue to search for what happiness consists of. You will never live if you are looking for the meaning of life.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Open your eyes, look within. Are you satisfied with the life you're living?
author: Bob Marley

quote: Life is a lively process of becoming.
author: Douglas MacArthur

quote: We are here to add what we can to life, not to get what we can from life.
author: William Osler

quote: Never be bullied into silence. Never allow yourself to be made a victim. Accept no one's definition of your life; define yourself.
author: Harvey Fierstein

quote: Don't go around saying the world owes you a living. The world owes you nothing. It was here first.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Life would be infinitely happier if we could only be born at the age of eighty and gradually approach eighteen.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The monotony and solitude of a quiet life stimulates the creative mind.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Only a life lived for others is a life worthwhile.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
author: Confucius

quote: Very little is needed to make a happy life; it is all within yourself, in your way of thinking.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Everything in life is luck.
author: Donald Trump

quote: It takes half your life before you discover life is a do-it-yourself project.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Life is ten percent what happens to you and ninety percent how you respond to it.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: When I stand before God at the end of my life, I would hope that I would not have a single bit of talent left, and could say, 'I used everything you gave me'.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: Ships that pass in the night, and speak each other in passing, only a signal shown, and a distant voice in the darkness; So on the ocean of life, we pass and speak one another, only a look and a voice, then darkness again and a silence.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: Life is a tragedy when seen in close-up, but a comedy in long-shot.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: Our life always expresses the result of our dominant thoughts.
author: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: The most important thing is to enjoy your life - to be happy - it's all that matters.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Life becomes harder for us when we live for others, but it also becomes richer and happier.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: Once you bring life into the world, you must protect it. We must protect it by changing the world.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: How far you go in life depends on your being tender with the young, compassionate with the aged, sympathetic with the striving and tolerant of the weak and strong. Because someday in your life you will have been all of these.
author: George Washington Carver

quote: A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.
author: Charles Darwin

quote: Life is short and we have never too much time for gladdening the hearts of those who are travelling the dark journey with us. Oh be swift to love, make haste to be kind.
author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: Look, I don't want to wax philosophic, but I will say that if you're alive you've got to flap your arms and legs, you've got to jump around a lot, for life is the very opposite of death, and therefore you must at very least think noisy and colorfully, or you're not alive.
author: Mel Brooks

quote: Surprise is the greatest gift which life can grant us.
author: Boris Pasternak

quote: When we remember we are all mad, the mysteries disappear and life stands explained.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Life loves the liver of it.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: There is a very fine line between loving life and being greedy for it.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: I bear a charmed life.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: This life, which had been the tomb of his virtue and of his honour, is but a walking shadow; a poor player, that struts and frets his hour upon the stage, and then is heard no more: it is a tale told by an idiot, full of sound and fury, signifying nothing.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: It is not length of life, but depth of life.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: All life is an experiment. The more experiments you make the better.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood. All is riddle, and the key to a riddle is another riddle.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: With the past, I have nothing to do; nor with the future. I live now.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Life consists in what a man is thinking of all day.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Life is far too important a thing ever to talk seriously about.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Life is never fair, and perhaps it is a good thing for most of us that it is not.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Life imitates art far more than art imitates Life.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Our truest life is when we are in dreams awake.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: The price of anything is the amount of life you exchange for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: To affect the quality of the day, that is the highest of arts.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: The art of living is more like wrestling than dancing.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Execute every act of thy life as though it were thy last.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Our life is what our thoughts make it.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: The courage of life is often a less dramatic spectacle than the courage of a final moment; but it is no less a magnificent mixture of triumph and tragedy.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Once you say you're going to settle for second, that's what happens to you in life.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: When life is too easy for us, we must beware or we may not be ready to meet the blows which sooner or later come to everyone, rich or poor.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Art is the proper task of life.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Life must be lived as play.
author: Plato

quote: My life is my message.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: There is more to life than increasing its speed.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Not life, but good life, is to be chiefly valued.
author: Socrates

quote: Beware the barrenness of a busy life.
author: Socrates

quote: The shoe that fits one person pinches another; there is no recipe for living that suits all cases.
author: Carl Jung

quote: We are all here for a spell, get all the good laughs you can.
author: Will Rogers

quote: Life does not cease to be funny when people die any more than it ceases to be serious when people laugh.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: A life spent making mistakes is not only more honorable, but more useful than a life spent doing nothing.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Doing what you love is the cornerstone of having abundance in your life.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: What we think determines what happens to us, so if we want to change our lives, we need to stretch our minds.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: To live a pure unselfish life, one must count nothing as one's own in the midst of abundance.
author: Buddha

quote: The basic fact about human existence is not that it is a tragedy, but that it is a bore. It is not so much a war as an endless standing in line.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: A person will sometimes devote all his life to the development of one part of his body - the wishbone.
author: Robert Frost

quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Our prime purpose in this life is to help others. And if you can't help them, at least don't hurt them.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Character develops itself in the stream of life.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: What is important in life is life, and not the result of life.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: All theory, dear friend, is gray, but the golden tree of life springs ever green.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Life is wasted on the living.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: If we live good lives, the times are also good. As we are, such are the times.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: If you love life, don't waste time, for time is what life is made up of.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: I still find each day too short for all the thoughts I want to think, all the walks I want to take, all the books I want to read, and all the friends I want to see.
author: John Burroughs

quote: Just as courage imperils life, fear protects it.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: As a well-spent day brings happy sleep, so a life well spent brings happy death.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Life well spent is long.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Life would be tragic if it weren't funny.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: There are three constants in life... change, choice and principles.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: All of life is peaks and valleys. Don't let the peaks get too high and the valleys too low.
author: John Wooden

quote: The good life is one inspired by love and guided by knowledge.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: To live is to think.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: While there's life, there's hope.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: My trade and art is to live.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: I don't believe people are looking for the meaning of life as much as they are looking for the experience of being alive.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: The privilege of a lifetime is being who you are.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: Nobody made a greater mistake than he who did nothing because he could do only a little.
author: Edmund Burke

quote: This life is worth living, we can say, since it is what we make it.
author: William James

quote: The greatest use of a life is to spend it on something that will outlast it.
author: William James

quote: A chain is no stronger than its weakest link, and life is after all a chain.
author: William James

quote: Why should we think upon things that are lovely? Because thinking determines life. It is a common habit to blame life upon the environment. Environment modifies life but does not govern life. The soul is stronger than its surroundings.
author: William James

quote: To live is so startling it leaves little time for anything else.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: Find ecstasy in life; the mere sense of living is joy enough.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: I argue thee that love is life. And life hath immortality.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: That it will never come again is what makes life sweet.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: I slept and dreamt that life was joy. I awoke and saw that life was service. I acted and behold, service was joy.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: We live in the world when we love it.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Into each life some rain must fall.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.
author: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: I decided, very early on, just to accept life unconditionally; I never expected it to do anything special for me, yet I seemed to accomplish far more than I had ever hoped. Most of the time it just happened to me without my ever seeking it.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: While we are postponing, life speeds by.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Life's like a play: it's not the length, but the excellence of the acting that matters.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Give me the luxuries of life and I will willingly do without the necessities.
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: He not busy being born is busy dying.
author: Bob Dylan

quote: Life has meaning only if one barters it day by day for something other than itself.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quote: Life is too short for long-term grudges.
author: Elon Musk

quote: The story of life is quicker than the blink of an eye, the story of love is hello, goodbye.
author: Jimi Hendrix

quote: The golden moments in the stream of life rush past us, and we see nothing but sand; the angels come to visit us, and we only know them when they are gone.
author: George Eliot

quote: What do we live for, if not to make life less difficult for each other?
author: George Eliot

quote: Our business in life is not to succeed, but to continue to fail in good spirits.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: There is only one difference between a long life and a good dinner: that, in the dinner, the sweets come last.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: An aim in life is the only fortune worth finding.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: Let life happen to you. Believe me: life is in the right, always.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: It is often said that before you die your life passes before your eyes. It is in fact true. It's called living.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: Life is what happens while you are busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon

quote: I did not direct my life. I didn't design it. I never made decisions. Things always came up and made them for me. That's what life is.
author: B. F. Skinner

quote: Life's a fight. It's a good fight of faith.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: Everything has been figured out, except how to live.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: True life is lived when tiny changes occur.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Life is pleasant. Death is peaceful. It's the transition that's troublesome.
author: Isaac Asimov

quote: I don't expect to live forever, but I do intend to hang on as long as possible.
author: Isaac Asimov

quote: Here is the test to find whether your mission on Earth is finished: if you're alive, it isn't.
author: Richard Bach

quote: What if you gave someone a gift, and they neglected to thank you for it - would you be likely to give them another? Life is the same way. In order to attract more of the blessings that life has to offer, you must truly appreciate what you already have.
author: Ralph Marston

quote: Get correct views of life, and learn to see the world in its true light. It will enable you to live pleasantly, to do good, and, when summoned away, to leave without regret.
author: Robert E. Lee

quote: There is no wealth but life.
author: John Ruskin

quote: A life is not important except in the impact it has on other lives.
author: Jackie Robinson

quote: The art of life is to know how to enjoy a little and to endure very much.
author: William Hazlitt

quote: It's only when we truly know and understand that we have a limited time on earth - and that we have no way of knowing when our time is up, we will then begin to live each day to the fullest, as if it was the only one we had.
author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quote: Live, so you do not have to look back and say: 'God, how I have wasted my life.'
author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quote: Unbeing dead isn't being alive.
author: e. e. cummings

quote: Life is like dancing. If we have a big floor, many people will dance. Some will get angry when the rhythm changes. But life is changing all the time.
author: Don Miguel Ruiz

quote: Life is anything that dies when you stomp on it.
author: Dave Barry

quote: Seventy percent of success in life is showing up.
author: Woody Allen

quote: You have succeeded in life when all you really want is only what you really need.
author: Vernon Howard

quote: The most satisfying thing in life is to have been able to give a large part of one's self to others.
author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quote: Life is very short and what we have to do must be done in the now.
author: Audre Lorde

quote: The true object of all human life is play. Earth is a task garden; heaven is a playground.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: The main facts in human life are five: birth, food, sleep, love and death.
author: E. M. Forster

quote: Life is largely a matter of expectation.
author: Horace

quote: Remember when life's path is steep to keep your mind even.
author: Horace

quote: I want to live my life, not record it.
author: Jackie Kennedy

quote: The truth is you don't know what is going to happen tomorrow. Life is a crazy ride, and nothing is guaranteed.
author: Eminem

quote: There is just one life for each of us: our own.
author: Euripides

quote: The greatest pleasure of life is love.
author: Euripides

quote: To me, if life boils down to one thing, it's movement. To live is to keep moving.
author: Jerry Seinfeld

quote: I think I've discovered the secret of life - you just hang around until you get used to it.
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: Any idiot can face a crisis - it's day to day living that wears you out.
author: Anton Chekhov

quote: Life is half spent before we know what it is.
author: George Herbert

quote: To be free is to have achieved your life.
author: Tennessee Williams

quote: Life is a great sunrise. I do not see why death should not be an even greater one.
author: Vladimir Nabokov

quote: A baby is God's opinion that life should go on.
author: Carl Sandburg

quote: Nearly all the best things that came to me in life have been unexpected, unplanned by me.
author: Carl Sandburg

quote: The aim of life is to live, and to live means to be aware, joyously, drunkenly, serenely, divinely aware.
author: Henry Miller

quote: I am simply trying to struggle through life; trying to do God's bidding.
author: George Lucas

quote: Life itself is the most wonderful fairy tale.
author: Hans Christian Andersen

quote: The greatest trap in our life is not success, popularity or power, but self-rejection.
author: Henri Nouwen

quote: Life is made up of marble and mud.
author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quote: When I hear somebody sigh, 'Life is hard,' I am always tempted to ask, 'Compared to what?'
author: Sydney J. Harris

quote: Life itself is the proper binge.
author: Julia Child

quote: Life isn't a matter of milestones, but of moments.
author: Rose Kennedy

quote: Who will tell whether one happy moment of love or the joy of breathing or walking on a bright morning and smelling the fresh air, is not worth all the suffering and effort which life implies.
author: Erich Fromm

quote: A man sooner or later discovers that he is the master-gardener of his soul, the director of his life.
author: James Allen

quote: The true secret of happiness lies in taking a genuine interest in all the details of daily life.
author: William Morris

quote: Every man dies. Not every man really lives.
author: William Wallace

quote: We can't plan life. All we can do is be available for it.
author: Lauryn Hill

quote: People living deeply have no fear of death.
author: Anais Nin

quote: The personal life deeply lived always expands into truths beyond itself.
author: Anais Nin

quote: Life consists not in holding good cards but in playing those you hold well.
author: Josh Billings

quote: To know nothing is the happiest life.
author: Desiderius Erasmus

quote: I have begun to think of life as a series of ripples widening out from an original center.
author: Seamus Heaney

quote: Today is your own. Tomorrow perchance may never come.
author: Swami Sivananda

quote: The man who has no inner-life is a slave to his surroundings.
author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: The best path through life is the highway.
author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: Throughout life people will make you mad, disrespect you and treat you bad. Let God deal with the things they do, cause hate in your heart will consume you too.
author: Will Smith

quote: Each day is the scholar of yesterday.
author: Publilius Syrus

quote: Life is made up of sobs, sniffles, and smiles, with sniffles predominating.
author: O. Henry

quote: To live is to change, and to be perfect is to have changed often.
author: John Henry Newman

quote: Growth is the only evidence of life.
author: John Henry Newman

quote: You can preach a better sermon with your life than with your lips.
author: Oliver Goldsmith

quote: Maybe all one can do is hope to end up with the right regrets.
author: Arthur Miller

quote: Life is a long lesson in humility.
author: James M. Barrie

quote: The Indian Summer of life should be a little sunny and a little sad, like the season, and infinite in wealth and depth of tone, but never hustled.
author: Henry Adams

quote: We live in a rainbow of chaos.
author: Paul Cezanne

quote: What we play is life.
author: Louis Armstrong

quote: Life is the art of drawing sufficient conclusions from insufficient premises.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: Most people have never learned that one of the main aims in life is to enjoy it.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: Life is not an exact science, it is an art.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: To live is like to love - all reason is against it, and all healthy instinct for it.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: The most exhausting thing in life is being insincere.
author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: Life is a gift, given in trust - like a child.
author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: Life is a song - sing it. Life is a game - play it. Life is a challenge - meet it. Life is a dream - realize it. Life is a sacrifice - offer it. Life is love - enjoy it.
author: Sai Baba

quote: The chief danger in life is that you may take too many precautions.
author: Alfred Adler

quote: I arise in the morning torn between a desire to improve the world and a desire to enjoy the world. This makes it hard to plan the day.
author: E. B. White

quote: Begin at once to live, and count each separate day as a separate life.
author: Seneca

quote: Life comes from the earth and life returns to the earth.
author: Zhuangzi

quote: Life will always be to a large extent what we ourselves make it.
author: Samuel Smiles

quote: Life is something to do when you can't get to sleep.
author: Fran Lebowitz

quote: I love life because what more is there?
author: Anthony Hopkins

quote: We do not remember days, we remember moments.
author: Cesare Pavese

quote: When I was a little kid, we only knew about our nine planets. Since then, we've downgraded Pluto but have discovered that other solar systems and stars are common. So life is probably quite prevalent.
author: Buzz Aldrin

quote: There may be aliens in our Milky Way galaxy, and there are billions of other galaxies. The probability is almost certain that there is life somewhere in space.
author: Buzz Aldrin

quote: Take care of your life and the Lord will take care of your death.
author: George Whitefield

quote: Life is painting a picture, not doing a sum.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quote: Life is a horizontal fall.
author: Jean Cocteau

quote: Life appears to me too short to be spent in nursing animosity, or registering wrongs.
author: Charlotte Bronte

quote: Every man regards his own life as the New Year's Eve of time.
author: Jean Paul

quote: Like a morning dream, life becomes more and more bright the longer we live, and the reason of everything appears more clear. What has puzzled us before seems less mysterious, and the crooked paths look straighter as we approach the end.
author: Jean Paul

quote: Maybe that's what life is... a wink of the eye and winking stars.
author: Jack Kerouac

quote: Nothing is more precious than life... especially the life of your child.
author: Peter Diamandis

quote: He is a man, who is to be a man, the fruit is always present in the seed.
author: Tertullian

quote: Make space in your life for the things that matter, for family and friends, love and generosity, fun and joy. Without this, you will burn out in mid-career and wonder where your life went.
author: Jonathan Sacks

quote: Life is a zoo in a jungle.
author: Peter De Vries

quote: For the happiest life, days should be rigorously planned, nights left open to chance.
author: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: I am an artist... I am here to live out loud.
author: Emile Zola

quote: Kindness, I've discovered, is everything in life.
author: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quote: No man is a failure who is enjoying life.
author: William Feather

quote: One way to get the most out of life is to look upon it as an adventure.
author: William Feather

quote: All I really need to know... I learned in kindergarten.
author: Robert Fulghum

quote: Life is a culmination of the past, an awareness of the present, an indication of a future beyond knowledge, the quality that gives a touch of divinity to matter.
author: Charles Lindbergh

quote: Life is a series of collisions with the future; it is not the sum of what we have been, but what we yearn to be.
author: Jose Ortega y Gasset

quote: I am I plus my circumstances.
author: Jose Ortega y Gasset

quote: We cannot put off living until we are ready.
author: Jose Ortega y Gasset

quote: Life is a moderately good play with a badly written third act.
author: Truman Capote

quote: All the art of living lies in a fine mingling of letting go and holding on.
author: Havelock Ellis

quote: Pain and death are part of life. To reject them is to reject life itself.
author: Havelock Ellis

quote: The indispensable first step to getting the things you want out of life is this: decide what you want.
author: Ben Stein

quote: Wrong life cannot be lived rightly.
author: Theodor W. Adorno

quote: To be able to look back upon one's past life with satisfaction is to live twice.
author: John Dalberg-Acton

quote: Any life is made up of a single moment, the moment in which a man finds out, once and for all, who he is.
author: Jorge Luis Borges

quote: Variety's the very spice of life, That gives it all its flavor.
author: William Cowper

quote: If you live long enough, you'll make mistakes. But if you learn from them, you'll be a better person. It's how you handle adversity, not how it affects you. The main thing is never quit, never quit, never quit.
author: William J. Clinton

quote: You're only here for a short visit. Don't hurry, don't worry. And be sure to smell the flowers along the way.
author: Walter Hagen

quote: The only disability in life is a bad attitude.
author: Scott Hamilton

quote: Fortunately analysis is not the only way to resolve inner conflicts. Life itself still remains a very effective therapist.
author: Karen Horney

quote: Life itself still remains a very effective therapist.
author: Karen Horney

quote: Life is growth. If we stop growing, technically and spiritually, we are as good as dead.
author: Morihei Ueshiba

quote: You don't have to be the Dalai Lama to tell people that life's about change.
author: John Cleese

quote: Life leaps like a geyser for those who drill through the rock of inertia.
author: Alexis Carrel

quote: Wars and elections are both too big and too small to matter in the long run. The daily work - that goes on, it adds up.
author: Barbara Kingsolver

quote: We need to give each other the space to grow, to be ourselves, to exercise our diversity. We need to give each other space so that we may both give and receive such beautiful things as ideas, openness, dignity, joy, healing, and inclusion.
author: Max de Pree

quote: I have a simple philosophy: Fill what's empty. Empty what's full. Scratch where it itches.
author: Alice Roosevelt Longworth

quote: Nobody got where they are today by living for tomorrow.
author: Tom Wilson

quote: Life is a work in progress.
author: Jeff Rich

quote: My formula for living is quite simple. I get up in the morning and I go to bed at night. In between, I occupy myself as best I can.
author: Cary Grant

quote: The hardest years in life are those between ten and seventy.
author: Helen Hayes

quote: Life is a lot like jazz... it's best when you improvise.
author: George Gershwin

quote: Life is a mirror and will reflect back to the thinker what he thinks into it.
author: Ernest Holmes

quote: The difficulty in life is the choice.
author: George A. Moore

quote: Mindfulness is about love and loving life. When you cultivate this love, it gives you clarity and compassion for life, and your actions happen in accordance with that.
author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quote: Kindness in words creates confidence. Kindness in thinking creates profoundness. Kindness in giving creates love.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Love is of all passions the strongest, for it attacks simultaneously the head, the heart and the senses.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: I have decided to stick with love. Hate is too great a burden to bear.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Love is always bestowed as a gift - freely, willingly and without expectation. We don't love to be loved; we love to love.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: Love and compassion are necessities, not luxuries. Without them humanity cannot survive.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: One is loved because one is loved. No reason is needed for loving.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Fortune and love favor the brave.
author: Ovid

quote: The course of true love never did run smooth.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Man must evolve for all human conflict a method which rejects revenge, aggression and retaliation. The foundation of such a method is love.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: What we have once enjoyed we can never lose. All that we love deeply becomes a part of us.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Life without love is like a tree without blossoms or fruit.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: If your heart is a volcano, how shall you expect flowers to bloom?
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Love is a canvas furnished by nature and embroidered by imagination.
author: Voltaire

quote: The hunger for love is much more difficult to remove than the hunger for bread.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: You can search throughout the entire universe for someone who is more deserving of your love and affection than you are yourself, and that person is not to be found anywhere. You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe deserve your love and affection.
author: Buddha

quote: A new command I give you: Love one another. As I have loved you, so you must love one another.
author: Jesus Christ

quote: Affection is responsible for nine-tenths of whatever solid and durable happiness there is in our lives.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: I was born with an enormous need for affection, and a terrible need to give it.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Tell me who admires and loves you, and I will tell you who you are.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quote: We are never so defensless against suffering as when we love.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: Love takes up where knowledge leaves off.
author: Thomas Aquinas

quote: The love we have in our youth is superficial compared to the love that an old man has for his old wife.
author: Will Durant

quote: Only do what your heart tells you.
author: Princess Diana

quote: With our love, we could save the world.
author: George Harrison

quote: Love is what you've been through with somebody.
author: James Thurber

quote: A man is already halfway in love with any woman who listens to him.
author: Brendan Behan

quote: Sometimes it's a form of love just to talk to somebody that you have nothing in common with and still be fascinated by their presence.
author: David Byrne

quote: The first duty of love is to listen.
author: Paul Tillich

quote: Only love interests me, and I am only in contact with things that revolve around love.
author: Marc Chagall

quote: At the beginning and at the end of love, the two lovers are embarrassed to find themselves alone.
author: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: Great thoughts come from the heart.
author: Luc de Clapiers

quote: Gravitation is not responsible for people falling in love.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Love is a better teacher than duty.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: You can't blame gravity for falling in love.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: In the flush of love's light, we dare be brave. And suddenly we see that love costs all we are, and will ever be. Yet it is only love which sets us free.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: If you would be loved, love, and be loveable.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: As soon go kindle fire with snow, as seek to quench the fire of love with words.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Love is a smoke made with the fume of sighs.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: I was adored once too.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: All mankind love a lover.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Who, being loved, is poor?
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Keep love in your heart. A life without it is like a sunless garden when the flowers are dead.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: At the center of non-violence stands the principle of love.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: There can be no deep disappointment where there is not deep love.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
author: Aristotle

quote: Love is like a beautiful flower which I may not touch, but whose fragrance makes the garden a place of delight just the same.
author: Helen Keller

quote: There is no remedy for love but to love more.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: The giving of love is an education in itself.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: We love life, not because we are used to living but because we are used to loving.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: A pair of powerful spectacles has sometimes sufficed to cure a person in love.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: At the touch of love everyone becomes a poet.
author: Plato

quote: Love is the joy of the good, the wonder of the wise, the amazement of the Gods.
author: Plato

quote: The god of love lives in a state of need. It is a need. It is an urge. It is a homeostatic imbalance. Like hunger and thirst, it's almost impossible to stamp out.
author: Plato

quote: Where there is love there is life.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Love... it surrounds every being and extends slowly to embrace all that shall be.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Love possesses not nor will it be possessed, for love is sufficient unto love.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Love is a gross exaggeration of the difference between one person and everybody else.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: First love is only a little foolishness and a lot of curiosity.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: The ear is the avenue to the heart.
author: Voltaire

quote: Love does not begin and end the way we seem to think it does. Love is a battle, love is a war; love is a growing up.
author: James Baldwin

quote: Love takes off masks that we fear we cannot live without and know we cannot live within.
author: James Baldwin

quote: Love him and let him love you. Do you think anything else under heaven really matters?
author: James Baldwin

quote: I have found the paradox, that if you love until it hurts, there can be no more hurt, only more love.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Hatred does not cease by hatred, but only by love; this is the eternal rule.
author: Buddha

quote: You, yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
author: Buddha

quote: Love is the triumph of imagination over intelligence.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: Love is like war: easy to begin but very hard to stop.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: Love is an irresistible desire to be irresistibly desired.
author: Robert Frost

quote: As the Father has loved me, so have I loved you.
author: Jesus Christ

quote: Love does not dominate; it cultivates.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: To witness two lovers is a spectacle for the gods.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: We loved with a love that was more than love.
author: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: This love is silent.
author: T. S. Eliot

quote: Love is the beauty of the soul.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: Love is like a friendship caught on fire. In the beginning a flame, very pretty, often hot and fierce, but still only light and flickering. As love grows older, our hearts mature and our love becomes as coals, deep-burning and unquenchable.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Love is the only gold.
author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: 'Tis better to have loved and lost than never to have loved at all.
author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: Passion is momentary; love is enduring.
author: John Wooden

quote: To fear love is to fear life, and those who fear life are already three parts dead.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Those who have never known the deep intimacy and the intense companionship of mutual love have missed the best thing that life has to give.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: I'm not saying that love always takes you to heaven. Your life can become a nightmare. But that said, it is worth taking the risk.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Love is the attempt to form a friendship inspired by beauty.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: There is room in the smallest cottage for a happy loving pair.
author: Friedrich Schiller

quote: Love is the greatest refreshment in life.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Love is a friendship set to music.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: Lord, grant that I might not so much seek to be loved as to love.
author: Francis of Assisi

quote: For small creatures such as we the vastness is bearable only through love.
author: Carl Sagan

quote: You don't want to love - your eternal and abnormal craving is to be loved. You aren't positive, you're negative. You absorb, absorb, as if you must fill yourself up with love, because you've got a shortage somewhere.
author: D. H. Lawrence

quote: In every living thing there is the desire for love.
author: D. H. Lawrence

quote: Love is the wisdom of the fool and the folly of the wise.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: Love is the difficult realization that something other than oneself is real.
author: Iris Murdoch

quote: We can only learn to love by loving.
author: Iris Murdoch

quote: We are all born for love. It is the principle of existence, and its only end.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: The first magic of love is our ignorance that it can ever end.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Love is the only reality and it is not a mere sentiment. It is the ultimate truth that lies at the heart of creation.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: It is difficult to know at what moment love begins; it is less difficult to know that it has begun.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: Don't forget to love yourself.
author: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: Love many things, for therein lies the true strength, and whosoever loves much performs much, and can accomplish much, and what is done in love is done well.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: The way to know life is to love many things.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: I feel that there is nothing more truly artistic than to love people.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: Love is life. And if you miss love, you miss life.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: We all need each other.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Love has reasons which reason cannot understand.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: When we are in love we seem to ourselves quite different from what we were before.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: If you wished to be loved, love.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Love in its essence is spiritual fire.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: There isn't any formula or method. You learn to love by loving - by paying attention and doing what one thereby discovers has to be done.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: Love seeketh not itself to please, nor for itself hath any care, but for another gives its ease, and builds a Heaven in Hell's despair.
author: William Blake

quote: Love does not consist in gazing at each other, but in looking outward together in the same direction.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quote: Blessed is the influence of one true, loving human soul on another.
author: George Eliot

quote: I like not only to be loved, but also to be told I am loved.
author: George Eliot

quote: Love prefers twilight to daylight.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quote: The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: To love another person is to see the face of God.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Life is the flower for which love is the honey.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: To love is to act.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: You can give without loving, but you can never love without giving.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: To say 'I love you' one must first be able to say the 'I.'
author: Ayn Rand

quote: Once the realization is accepted that even between the closest human beings infinite distances continue, a wonderful living side by side can grow, if they succeed in loving the distance between them which makes it possible for each to see the other whole against the sky.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: Love consists in this, that two solitudes protect and touch and greet each other.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: The love we give away is the only love we keep.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Love is metaphysical gravity.
author: R. Buckminster Fuller

quote: Love is the flower you've got to let grow.
author: John Lennon

quote: Everything is clearer when you're in love.
author: John Lennon

quote: We are born of love; Love is our mother.
author: Rumi

quote: The moment you have in your heart this extraordinary thing called love and feel the depth, the delight, the ecstasy of it, you will discover that for you the world is transformed.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: Sometimes the heart sees what is invisible to the eye.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Love seeks one thing only: the good of the one loved. It leaves all the other secondary effects to take care of themselves. Love, therefore, is its own reward.
author: Thomas Merton

quote: Can miles truly separate you from friends... If you want to be with someone you love, aren't you already there?
author: Richard Bach

quote: A loving heart is the beginning of all knowledge.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: Love is space and time measured by the heart.
author: Marcel Proust

quote: We're born alone, we live alone, we die alone. Only through our love and friendship can we create the illusion for the moment that we're not alone.
author: Orson Welles

quote: It is easier to love humanity as a whole than to love one's neighbor.
author: Eric Hoffer

quote: Take away love and our earth is a tomb.
author: Robert Browning

quote: Love is energy of life.
author: Robert Browning

quote: A loving heart is the truest wisdom.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: Accustom yourself continually to make many acts of love, for they enkindle and melt the soul.
author: Saint Teresa of Avila

quote: Friends can help each other. A true friend is someone who lets you have total freedom to be yourself - and especially to feel. Or, not feel. Whatever you happen to be feeling at the moment is fine with them. That's what real love amounts to - letting a person be what he really is.
author: Jim Morrison

quote: Love is like an hourglass, with the heart filling up as the brain empties.
author: Jules Renard

quote: There is no disguise which can hide love for long where it exists, or simulate it where it does not.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: True love is like ghosts, which everyone talks about and few have seen.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: There is only one kind of love, but there are a thousand imitations.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: The love of liberty is the love of others; the love of power is the love of ourselves.
author: William Hazlitt

quote: Be of love a little more careful than of anything.
author: e. e. cummings

quote: Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own... Jealousy is a disease, love is a healthy condition. The immature mind often mistakes one for the other, or assumes that the greater the love, the greater the jealousy.
author: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: Love makes your soul crawl out from its hiding place.
author: Zora Neale Hurston

quote: Loving others always costs us something and requires effort. And you have to decide to do it on purpose. You can't wait for a feeling to motivate you.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: Absence sharpens love, presence strengthens it.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: There is more pleasure in loving than in being beloved.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: Love yourself first and everything else falls into line. You really have to love yourself to get anything done in this world.
author: Lucille Ball

quote: The eyes those silent tongues of love.
author: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: Absence - that common cure of love.
author: Lord Byron

quote: Who loves, raves.
author: Lord Byron

quote: Friendship is Love without his wings!
author: Lord Byron

quote: Someday, after mastering the winds, the waves, the tides and gravity, we shall harness for God the energies of love, and then, for a second time in the history of the world, man will have discovered fire.
author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quote: Love is a sacred reserve of energy; it is like the blood of spiritual evolution.
author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quote: The way to love anything is to realize that it may be lost.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: Love means to love that which is unlovable; or it is no virtue at all.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: Do all things with love.
author: Og Mandino

quote: We can't command our love, but we can our actions.
author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quote: A woman knows the face of the man she loves as a sailor knows the open sea.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: Nobody loves a woman because she is handsome or ugly, stupid or intelligent. We love because we love.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: The more one judges, the less one loves.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: Love is the poetry of the senses.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: The fact is that love is of two kinds, one which commands, and one which obeys. The two are quite distinct, and the passion to which the one gives rise is not the passion of the other.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: True love is eternal, infinite, and always like itself. It is equal and pure, without violent demonstrations: it is seen with white hairs and is always young in the heart.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: Love is my religion - I could die for it.
author: John Keats

quote: If equal affection cannot be, let the more loving be me.
author: W. H. Auden

quote: Love is always being given where it is not required.
author: E. M. Forster

quote: If you find someone you love in your life, then hang on to that love.
author: Princess Diana

quote: All love shifts and changes. I don't know if you can be wholeheartedly in love all the time.
author: Julie Andrews

quote: He is not a lover who does not love forever.
author: Euripides

quote: Down on your knees, and thank heaven, fasting, for a good man's love.
author: Euripides

quote: Love is all we have, the only way that each can help the other.
author: Euripides

quote: Love is blind.
author: Geoffrey Chaucer

quote: Love conquers all.
author: Virgil

quote: We may give without loving, but we cannot love without giving.
author: Bernard Meltzer

quote: If you want to be loved, be lovable.
author: Ovid

quote: All love is vanquished by a succeeding love.
author: Ovid

quote: You learn to speak by speaking, to study by studying, to run by running, to work by working; in just the same way, you learn to love by loving.
author: Anatole France

quote: Love is a great beautifier.
author: Louisa May Alcott

quote: A gentle heart is tied with an easy thread.
author: George Herbert

quote: Familiar acts are beautiful through love.
author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quote: He who loves, flies, runs, and rejoices; he is free and nothing holds him back.
author: Henri Matisse

quote: Friendship often ends in love; but love in friendship - never.
author: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: People protect what they love.
author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quote: A part of kindness consists in loving people more than they deserve.
author: Joseph Joubert

quote: Love is friendship that has caught fire. It is quiet understanding, mutual confidence, sharing and forgiving. It is loyalty through good and bad times. It settles for less than perfection and makes allowances for human weaknesses.
author: Ann Landers

quote: I think it is all a matter of love: the more you love a memory, the stronger and stranger it is.
author: Vladimir Nabokov

quote: Life is like an onion. You peel it off one layer at a time, and sometimes you weep.
author: Carl Sandburg

quote: The one thing we can never get enough of is love. And the one thing we never give enough is love.
author: Henry Miller

quote: Time is too slow for those who wait, too swift for those who fear, too long for those who grieve, too short for those who rejoice, but for those who love, time is eternity.
author: Henry Van Dyke

quote: Love is the best thing in the world, and the thing that lives the longest.
author: Henry Van Dyke

quote: The journey from teaching about love to allowing myself to be loved proved much longer than I realised.
author: Henri Nouwen

quote: If you do not love me I shall not be loved If I do not love you I shall not love.
author: Samuel Beckett

quote: Selfishness is one of the qualities apt to inspire love.
author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quote: In love the paradox occurs that two beings become one and yet remain two.
author: Erich Fromm

quote: Immature love says: 'I love you because I need you.' Mature love says 'I need you because I love you.'
author: Erich Fromm

quote: Love is the only sane and satisfactory answer to the problem of human existence.
author: Erich Fromm

quote: Love is love's reward.
author: John Dryden

quote: Pains of love be sweeter far than all other pleasures are.
author: John Dryden

quote: But love's a malady without a cure.
author: John Dryden

quote: Love is a springtime plant that perfumes everything with its hope, even the ruins to which it clings.
author: Gustave Flaubert

quote: There are never enough I Love You's.
author: Lenny Bruce

quote: Love can be unselfish, in the sense of being benevolent and generous, without being selfless.
author: Mortimer Adler

quote: Love without conversation is impossible.
author: Mortimer Adler

quote: The love which moves the world, according to common Christian belief, is God's love and the love of God.
author: Mortimer Adler

quote: We love because it's the only true adventure.
author: Nikki Giovanni

quote: The only abnormality is the incapacity to love.
author: Anais Nin

quote: Do not seek the because - in love there is no because, no reason, no explanation, no solutions.
author: Anais Nin

quote: Love looks through a telescope; envy, through a microscope.
author: Josh Billings

quote: More than kisses, letters mingle souls.
author: John Donne

quote: I can live without money, but I cannot live without love.
author: Judy Garland

quote: Love has a tide!
author: Helen Hunt Jackson

quote: When love is at its best, one loves so much that he cannot forget.
author: Helen Hunt Jackson

quote: Love feels no burden, thinks nothing of trouble, attempts what is above its strength, pleads no excuse of impossibility; for it thinks all things lawful for itself, and all things possible.
author: Thomas a Kempis

quote: He who loves with purity considers not the gift of the lover, but the love of the giver.
author: Thomas a Kempis

quote: The love of our private friends is the only preparatory exercise for the love of all men.
author: John Henry Newman

quote: Let no one who loves be unhappy, even love unreturned has its rainbow.
author: James M. Barrie

quote: The praise that comes from love does not make us vain, but more humble.
author: James M. Barrie

quote: Love dies only when growth stops.
author: Pearl S. Buck

quote: There is no person that love cannot heal; there is no soul that love cannot save.
author: Carlos Santana

quote: Sympathy constitutes friendship; but in love there is a sort of antipathy, or opposing passion. Each strives to be the other, and both together make up one whole.
author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: Woe to the man whose heart has not learned while young to hope, to love - and to put its trust in life.
author: Joseph Conrad

quote: I love that feeling of being in love, the effect of having butterflies when you wake up in the morning. That is special.
author: Jennifer Aniston

quote: Love is an energy which exists of itself. It is its own value.
author: Thornton Wilder

quote: Love is being stupid together.
author: Paul Valery

quote: Love is the ultimate expression of the will to live.
author: Tom Wolfe

quote: Don't threaten me with love, baby. Let's just go walking in the rain.
author: Billie Holiday

quote: Love is like a faucet, it turns off and on.
author: Billie Holiday

quote: If thou must love me, let it be for naught except for love's sake only.
author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quote: Who so loves believes the impossible.
author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quote: If you wish to be loved, show more of your faults than your virtues.
author: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quote: People who throw kisses are hopelessly lazy.
author: Bob Hope

quote: Love is the hardest habit to break, and the most difficult to satisfy.
author: Drew Barrymore

quote: Love doesn't make the world go 'round. Love is what makes the ride worthwhile.
author: Franklin P. Jones

quote: Love is supreme and unconditional; like is nice but limited.
author: Duke Ellington

quote: Who ever loved that loved not at first sight?
author: Christopher Marlowe

quote: The art of love is largely the art of persistence.
author: Albert Ellis

quote: Love is only a dirty trick played on us to achieve continuation of the species.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: Love is a force more formidable than any other. It is invisible - it cannot be seen or measured, yet it is powerful enough to transform you in a moment, and offer you more joy than any material possession could.
author: Barbara De Angelis

quote: Love's greatest gift is its ability to make everything it touches sacred.
author: Barbara De Angelis

quote: I am happier when I love than when I am loved. I adore my husband, my son, my grandchildren, my mother, my dog, and frankly, I don't know if they even like me. But who cares? Loving them is my joy.
author: Isabel Allende

quote: Falling in love consists merely in uncorking the imagination and bottling the common sense.
author: Helen Rowland

quote: There is a woman at the beginning of all great things.
author: Alphonse de Lamartine

quote: To love for the sake of being loved is human, but to love for the sake of loving is angelic.
author: Alphonse de Lamartine

quote: There's no bad consequence to loving fully, with all your heart. You always gain by giving love.
author: Reese Witherspoon

quote: It is love, not reason, that is stronger than death.
author: Thomas Mann

quote: Love is the child of illusion and the parent of disillusion.
author: Miguel de Unamuno

quote: It is sad not to love, but it is much sadder not to be able to love.
author: Miguel de Unamuno

quote: We waste time looking for the perfect lover, instead of creating the perfect love.
author: Tom Robbins

quote: The highest function of love is that it makes the loved one a unique and irreplacable being.
author: Tom Robbins

quote: The degree of loving is measured by the degree of giving.
author: Edwin Louis Cole

quote: Faith makes all things possible... love makes all things easy.
author: Dwight L. Moody

quote: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
author: Confucius

quote: Never lose an opportunity of seeing anything beautiful, for beauty is God's handwriting.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Beauty itself is but the sensible image of the Infinite.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: Think of all the beauty still left around you and be happy.
author: Anne Frank

quote: People are like stained - glass windows. They sparkle and shine when the sun is out, but when the darkness sets in, their true beauty is revealed only if there is a light from within.
author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quote: Let us live for the beauty of our own reality.
author: Charles Lamb

quote: The problem with beauty is that it's like being born rich and getting poorer.
author: Joan Collins

quote: Taking joy in living is a woman's best cosmetic.
author: Rosalind Russell

quote: The pursuit of truth and beauty is a sphere of activity in which we are permitted to remain children all our lives.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: It is time for parents to teach young people early on that in diversity there is beauty and there is strength.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Beauty and folly are old companions.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Flowers... are a proud assertion that a ray of beauty outvalues all the utilities of the world.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Beauty without expression is boring.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Love of beauty is taste. The creation of beauty is art.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Personal beauty is a greater recommendation than any letter of reference.
author: Aristotle

quote: Beauty is a short-lived tyranny.
author: Socrates

quote: Beauty is eternity gazing at itself in a mirror.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Of life's two chief prizes, beauty and truth, I found the first in a loving heart and the second in a laborer's hand.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Beauty is all very well at first sight; but who ever looks at it when it has been in the house three days?
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: It is not sufficient to see and to know the beauty of a work. We must feel and be affected by it.
author: Voltaire

quote: She got her looks from her father. He's a plastic surgeon.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: You're beautiful, like a May fly.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: The soul that sees beauty may sometimes walk alone.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Beauty is a manifestation of secret natural laws, which otherwise would have been hidden from us forever.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Beauty of whatever kind, in its supreme development, invariably excites the sensitive soul to tears.
author: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: Beauty is indeed a good gift of God; but that the good may not think it a great good, God dispenses it even to the wicked.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: Since love grows within you, so beauty grows. For love is the beauty of the soul.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: Beauty is unbearable, drives us to despair, offering us for a minute the glimpse of an eternity that we should like to stretch out over the whole of time.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Beauty is the promise of happiness.
author: Edmund Burke

quote: Beauty in distress is much the most affecting beauty.
author: Edmund Burke

quote: Beauty is not caused. It is.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: Beauty is truth's smile when she beholds her own face in a perfect mirror.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: I do not have much patience with a thing of beauty that must be explained to be understood. If it does need additional interpretation by someone other than the creator, then I question whether it has fulfilled its purpose.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: The beauty of a woman is not in a facial mode but the true beauty in a woman is reflected in her soul. It is the caring that she lovingly gives the passion that she shows. The beauty of a woman grows with the passing years.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: The beauty of a woman must be seen from in her eyes, because that is the doorway to her heart, the place where love resides.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Imagination disposes of everything; it creates beauty, justice, and happiness, which are everything in this world.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: I define nothing. Not beauty, not patriotism. I take each thing as it is, without prior rules about what it should be.
author: Bob Dylan

quote: Beauty is worse than wine, it intoxicates both the holder and beholder.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: Exuberance is beauty.
author: William Blake

quote: The best part of beauty is that which no picture can express.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: To love beauty is to see light.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Virtue has a veil, vice a mask.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Dear God! how beauty varies in nature and art. In a woman the flesh must be like marble; in a statue the marble must be like flesh.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Faces that have charmed us the most escape us the soonest.
author: Walter Scott

quote: I heard the old, old, men say 'all that's beautiful drifts away, like the waters.'
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: I don't think of all the misery but of the beauty that still remains.
author: Anne Frank

quote: It is amazing how complete is the delusion that beauty is goodness.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: If you get simple beauty and naught else, you get about the best thing God invents.
author: Robert Browning

quote: Beauty awakens the soul to act.
author: Dante Alighieri

quote: Heat cannot be separated from fire, or beauty from The Eternal.
author: Dante Alighieri

quote: My mother always called me an ugly weed, so I never was aware of anything until I was older. Plain girls should have someone telling them they are beautiful. Sometimes this works miracles.
author: Hedy Lamarr

quote: A thing of beauty is a joy forever: its loveliness increases; it will never pass into nothingness.
author: John Keats

quote: Beauty, n: the power by which a woman charms a lover and terrifies a husband.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: A beauty is a woman you notice; a charmer is one who notices you.
author: Adlai Stevenson I

quote: Beauty is in the heart of the beholder.
author: H. G. Wells

quote: Beauty is a fragile gift.
author: Ovid

quote: If the path be beautiful, let us not ask where it leads.
author: Anatole France

quote: The world's biggest power is the youth and beauty of a woman.
author: Chanakya

quote: In youth and beauty, wisdom is but rare!
author: Homer

quote: Every girl should use what Mother Nature gave her before Father Time takes it away.
author: Laurence J. Peter

quote: Beauty in things exists in the mind which contemplates them.
author: David Hume

quote: Love built on beauty, soon as beauty, dies.
author: John Donne

quote: Real beauty knocks you a little bit off kilter.
author: David Byrne

quote: Beauty is whatever gives joy.
author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quote: You know when I feel inwardly beautiful? When I am with my girlfriends and we are having a 'goddess circle'.
author: Jennifer Aniston

quote: Zest is the secret of all beauty. There is no beauty that is attractive without zest.
author: Christian Dior

quote: Beauty is merciless. You do not look at it, it looks at you and does not forgive.
author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: In life, as in art, the beautiful moves in curves.
author: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quote: Goodness is beauty in the best estate.
author: Christopher Marlowe

quote: We live in a wonderful world that is full of beauty, charm and adventure. There is no end to the adventures that we can have if only we seek them with our eyes open.
author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quote: In every man's heart there is a secret nerve that answers to the vibrations of beauty.
author: Christopher Morley

quote: Beauty is ever to the lonely mind a shadow fleeting; she is never plain. She is a visitor who leaves behind the gift of grief, the souvenir of pain.
author: Christopher Morley

quote: The more often we see the things around us - even the beautiful and wonderful things - the more they become invisible to us. That is why we often take for granted the beauty of this world: the flowers, the trees, the birds, the clouds - even those we love. Because we see things so often, we see them less and less.
author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quote: Even in the centuries which appear to us to be the most monstrous and foolish, the immortal appetite for beauty has always found satisfaction.
author: Charles Baudelaire

quote: Beauty is variable, ugliness is constant.
author: Douglas Horton

quote: The absence of flaw in beauty is itself a flaw.
author: Havelock Ellis

quote: As soon as beauty is sought not from religion and love, but for pleasure, it degrades the seeker.
author: Annie Dillard

quote: Beauty is that which is simultaneously attractive and sublime.
author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel

quote: How goodness heightens beauty!
author: Milan Kundera

quote: Without realizing it, the individual composes his life according to the laws of beauty even in times of greatest distress.
author: Milan Kundera

quote: The love of beauty in its multiple forms is the noblest gift of the human cerebrum.
author: Alexis Carrel

quote: I was not a good-lookin' girl. I was extremely skinny. I wasn't pretty. I wasn't cool.
author: Celine Dion

quote: A witty woman is a treasure; a witty beauty is a power.
author: George Meredith

quote: Gorgeous hair is the best revenge.
author: Ivana Trump

quote: I would rather be adorned by beauty of character than jewels. Jewels are the gift of fortune, while character comes from within.
author: Plautus

quote: There is a role and function for beauty in our time.
author: Tadao Ando

quote: You can't really say what is beautiful about a place, but the image of the place will remain vividly with you.
author: Tadao Ando

quote: There is a kind of beauty in imperfection.
author: Conrad Hall

quote: What delights us in visible beauty is the invisible.
author: Marie von Ebner-Eschenbach

quote: There is no cosmetic for beauty like happiness.
author: Maria Mitchell

quote: I gave my beauty and my youth to men. I am going to give my wisdom and experience to animals.
author: Brigitte Bardot

quote: Beauty is only skin deep. If you go after someone just because she's beautiful but don't have anything to talk about, it's going to get boring fast. You want to look beyond the surface and see if you can have fun or if you have anything in common with this person.
author: Amanda Peet

quote: Beauty is our weapon against nature; by it we make objects, giving them limit, symmetry, proportion. Beauty halts and freezes the melting flux of nature.
author: Camille Paglia

quote: There is no personal achievement in being born beautiful.
author: Loretta Young

quote: Like charity, I believe glamour should begin at home.
author: Loretta Young

quote: Beauty, more than bitterness, makes the heart break.
author: Sara Teasdale

quote: Beauty is one of the rare things which does not lead to doubt of God.
author: Jean Anouilh

quote: Things are beautiful if you love them.
author: Jean Anouilh

quote: Beauty is power; a smile is its sword.
author: John Ray

quote: I'd like to grow up and be beautiful. I know it doesn't matter, but it doesn't hurt.
author: Kirsten Dunst

quote: Rare is the union of beauty and purity.
author: Juvenal

quote: I don't need plastic in my body to validate me as a woman.
author: Courtney Love

quote: Though beauty gives you a weird sense of entitlement, it's rather frightening and threatening to have others ascribe such importance to something you know you're just renting for a while.
author: Candice Bergen

quote: Why hurry over beautiful things? Why not linger and enjoy them?
author: Clara Schumann

quote: It's sad when girls think they don't have anything going on except being pretty.
author: Keri Russell

quote: Beauty makes idiots sad and wise men merry.
author: George Jean Nathan

quote: For me the greatest beauty always lies in the greatest clarity.
author: Gotthold Ephraim Lessing

quote: I sincerely feel that beauty largely comes from within.
author: Christy Turlington

quote: There is no definition of beauty, but when you can see someone's spirit coming through, something unexplainable, that's beautiful to me.
author: Liv Tyler

quote: It is easy to be beautiful; it is difficult to appear so.
author: Hosea Ballou

quote: Always think of what is useful and not what is beautiful. Beauty will come of its own accord.
author: Nikolai Gogol

quote: What beauty is, I know not, though it adheres to many things.
author: Albrecht Durer

quote: When virtue and modesty enlighten her charms, the lustre of a beautiful woman is brighter than the stars of heaven, and the influence of her power it is in vain to resist.
author: Akhenaton

quote: We are learning, too, that the love of beauty is one of Nature's greatest healers.
author: Ellsworth Huntington

quote: Character contributes to beauty. It fortifies a woman as her youth fades. A mode of conduct, a standard of courage, discipline, fortitude, and integrity can do a great deal to make a woman beautiful.
author: Jacqueline Bisset

quote: A mode of conduct, a standard of courage, discipline, fortitude and integrity can do a great deal to make a woman beautiful.
author: Jacqueline Bisset

quote: Beauty doesn't need ornaments. Softness can't bear the weight of ornaments.
author: Munshi Premchand

quote: Integrity reveals beauty.
author: Thomas Leonard

quote: Some guys say beauty is only skin deep. But when you walk into a party, you don't see somebody's brain. The initial contact has to be the sniffing.
author: James Caan

quote: Beauty has a lot to do with character.
author: Kevyn Aucoin

quote: There is hope and a kind of beauty in there somewhere, if you look for it.
author: H. R. Giger

quote: Every year of my life I grow more convinced that it is wisest and best to fix our attention on the beautiful and the good, and dwell as little as possible on the evil and the false.
author: Richard Cecil

quote: Beauty is the first present nature gives to women and the first it takes away.
author: Fay Weldon

quote: Life is full of beauty. Notice it. Notice the bumble bee, the small child, and the smiling faces. Smell the rain, and feel the wind. Live your life to the fullest potential, and fight for your dreams.
author: Ashley Smith

quote: Real beauty is to be true to oneself. That's what makes me feel good.
author: Laetitia Casta

quote: The beautiful remains so in ugly surroundings.
author: Malcolm de Chazal

quote: Inner beauty should be the most important part of improving one's self.
author: Priscilla Presley

quote: O human beauty, what a dream art thou, that we should cast our life and hopes away on thee!
author: Bryan Procter

quote: A women's greatest asset is her beauty.
author: Alex Comfort

quote: The plainer the dress, the greater luster does beauty appear.
author: Edward Wood, 1st Earl of Halifax

quote: Having inner beauty is something you develop on your own, and I like to think I have that.
author: Cindy Margolis

quote: Beauty is less important than quality.
author: Eugene Ormandy

quote: My dad had this philosophy that if you tell children they're beautiful and wonderful then they believe it, and they will be. So I never thought I was unattractive. But I was never one of the girls at school who had lots of boyfriends.
author: Emily Mortimer

quote: You can only perceive real beauty in a person as they get older.
author: Anouk Aimee

quote: It's amazing what sleep does for your looks.
author: Emily Procter

quote: Because beauty isn't enough, there must be something more.
author: Eva Herzigova

quote: A woman whose smile is open and whose expression is glad has a kind of beauty no matter what she wears.
author: Anne Roiphe

quote: The real sin against life is to abuse and destroy beauty, even one's own even more, one's own, for that has been put in our care and we are responsible for its well-being.
author: Katherine Anne Porter

quote: When everything else physical and mental seems to diminish, the appreciation of beauty is on the increase.
author: Bernard Berenson

quote: Beauty is only temporary, but your mind lasts you a lifetime.
author: Alicia Machado

quote: 'Handsome' means many things to many people. If people consider me handsome, I feel flattered - and have my parents to thank for it. Realistically, it doesn't hurt to be good-looking, especially in this business.
author: Richard Chamberlain

quote: I can't live without my beauty products. I love to be in my bathroom with my candles lit, morning, noon and night. I like taking hot baths and hot showers, using my body scrubs and lotions.
author: Traci Bingham

quote: Beauty is only skin deep.
author: Thomas Overbury

quote: Everybody needs beauty as well as bread, places to play in and pray in, where nature may heal and give strength to body and soul.
author: John Muir

quote: Perhaps the mission of an artist is to interpret beauty to people - the beauty within themselves.
author: Langston Hughes

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Yesterday we obeyed kings and bent our necks before emperors. But today we kneel only to truth, follow only beauty, and obey only love.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Beauty is a short-lived tyranny.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Most sets of values would give rise to universes that, although they might be very beautiful, would contain no one able to wonder at that beauty.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: Beauty for some provides escape, who gain a happiness in eyeing the gorgeous buttocks of the ape or Autumn sunsets exquisitely dying.
author: Langston Hughes

quote: Facts which at first seem improbable will, even on scant explanation, drop the cloak which has hidden them and stand forth in naked and simple beauty.
author: Galileo Galilei

quote: That which God said to the rose, and caused it to laugh in full-blown beauty, He said to my heart, and made it a hundred times more beautiful.
author: Rumi

quote: The terrifying and edible beauty of Art Nouveau architecture.
author: Salvador Dali

quote: The ideal beauty is a fugitive which is never found.
author: Joan Rivers

quote: Tramping is too easy with all this money. My days were more exciting when I was penniless and had to forage around for my next meal... I've decided that I'm going to live this life for some time to come. The freedom and simple beauty of it is just too good to pass up.
author: Christopher McCandless

quote: I have often said that the lure of flying is the lure of beauty.
author: Amelia Earhart

quote: I would warn you that I do not attribute to nature either beauty or deformity, order or confusion. Only in relation to our imagination can things be called beautiful or ugly, well-ordered or confused.
author: Baruch Spinoza

quote: It seems to me that the natural world is the greatest source of excitement; the greatest source of visual beauty; the greatest source of intellectual interest. It is the greatest source of so much in life that makes life worth living.
author: David Attenborough

quote: Beauty comes from a life well lived. If you've lived well, your smile lines are in the right places, and your frown lines aren't too bad, what more do you need?
author: Jennifer Garner

quote: What matters poverty? What matters anything to him who is enamoured of our art? Does he not carry in himself every joy and every beauty?
author: Sarah Bernhardt

quote: Form follows beauty.
author: Oscar Niemeyer

quote: It is cruel, you know, that music should be so beautiful. It has the beauty of loneliness of pain: of strength and freedom. The beauty of disappointment and never-satisfied love. The cruel beauty of nature and everlasting beauty of monotony.
author: Benjamin Britten

quote: In Divine unity and the affirmation of it, Divine beauty and dominical perfection become apparent. If there was no unity, that pre-eternal treasury would remain hidden.
author: Said Nursi

quote: Makeup is not a mask that covers up your beauty; it's a weapon that helps you express who you are from the inside.
author: Michelle Phan

quote: I'm not against beauty; it just sounds boring to me.
author: Tibor Kalman

quote: Our task must be to free ourselves by widening our circle of compassion to embrace all living creatures and the whole of nature and its beauty.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Mozart's music is so pure and beautiful that I see it as a reflection of the inner beauty of the universe.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: As we grow old, the beauty steals inward.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Beauty is an outward gift, which is seldom despised, except by those to whom it has been refused.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Beauty without grace is the hook without the bait.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: We find delight in the beauty and happiness of children that makes the heart too big for the body.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: A more secret, sweet, and overpowering beauty appears to man when his heart and mind open to the sentiment of virtue.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Jesus Christ belonged to the true race of prophets. He saw with open eye the mystery of the soul. Drawn by its severe harmony, ravished with its beauty, he lived in it and had his being there. Alone in all history, he estimated the greatness of man.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: There is something terribly morbid in the modern sympathy with pain. One should sympathise with the colour, the beauty, the joy of life. The less said about life's sores the better.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: She is a peacock in everything but beauty.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: If a work of art is rich and vital and complete, those who have artistic instincts will see its beauty, and those to whom ethics appeal more strongly than aesthetics will see its moral lesson. It will fill the cowardly with terror, and the unclean will see in it their own shame.
author: Oscar Wilde
